coming-soon.title: Coming soon
coming-soon.description: I am working on this functionality. Please come back later.

meta.title: SkillQ - Highlight your expertise effortlessly on resumé
meta.description: Enhance your resume with a handy tool to highlight professional skills and experience

hero.title: Highlight your expertise effortlessly on resumé
hero.description: SkillQ is a tool that allows you to easily add your skills and experience to your resume, making it more attractive and compelling to potential employers

meta.title: Builder
meta.description: Build your perfect resume with our handy skills builder

meta.title: Sponsor
meta.description: Help develop the project by becoming a sponsor

variants.title: Support Our Project
variants.description: We believe that important things should be accessible to everyone, and thanks to your support, we can continue to develop our service, improve its quality, and add new features. If you find our project useful, support us in one of the convenient ways

kofi.label: Ko-fi
kofi.description: Send us a symbolic "cup of coffee". It's a quick and easy way to show your appreciation.

boosty.label: Boosty
boosty.description: Become a regular supporter and gain access to exclusive materials.

github.label: GitHub Stars
github.description: Completely free: star our repository on GitHub to inspire other developers to get involved.

community.title: Community
community.description: A list of people who have supported the project

errors.title: Something's wrong
errors.message: Please, try to refresh the page

400.title: Bad request
400.message: Bad request. Please, check your request and try again

403.title: Forbidden
403.message: You don't have permission to access this resource

404.title: Page not found
404.message: We are sorry, but the page you are looking for cannot be found on our site. The page may have been deleted or moved, or you may have entered an incorrect address
